TEXT.English: Hello darling! I'm [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I hope we can work together and enjoy our time here in this strange world. What do you say?
Hmph, as if talking would solve our diplomacy issues. You haven't shown yourself to be very trustworthy. You can try again after I've had time to cool off.
Yeah, right. You want peace only so you can backstab me like so many of [OUR_EMPIRE]'s supposed 'elites' and 'nobles'. Not this time!
It seems your honesty has shown through once again, [CT_NAME]. I will continue to watch any developments in peacetime, of course. Now, you certainly have other issues to attend to, right?
Darling, how are you? Good to see you! Is there something I can help you with?
You have a lot of nerve showing up after how you've behaved towards me thus far. You better not be planning something truly underhoof...
Everypony will surely come out to my shows NOW, [CT_NAME]. All thanks to these little magic weapons of mine. Hahaha!
Darling, I'm so glad to see you! Would you be willing to part with such a small tribute? I think we could make this parternship work if you can help me out now...
Darling, could you possibly offer me a small tribute?
Darling, how are you doing? I hope this isn't a bad time... I would be quite happy with you if you could possibly agree to provide this tribute! What's your answer?
Darling, would you be willing to part with such a small offering? Our parternship is important to you, is it not?
I hope this isn't a bad time, Darling. Might you be willing to offer my great empire a small donation?
Darling, I would like to request a small donation from your great empire. Surely you can spare a few resources to bolster our partnership?
Darling, do you think you could accept this deal? I noticed that you are in need of help, so please allow me to give this to you!
Darling, I'm so glad to see you! Would you like this trade deal I have for you? I think we could make this parternship work after all...
Darling, how are you doing? I'd like to help you with this, please. I would be quite happy if you would take my offer!
Well, darling, what about this deal? I'm sure this will catch your attention...
Darling, I'm ready to enter into a peace treaty now. How much is ending our hostilities worth to you?
Hello darling, why don't we make a deal? I'm sure you're interested in this...
Hello darling, I'm thinking of cancelling this deal. However, you should be willing to renegotiate it, right? How much is this worth to you?
The diplomatic penalty for your unacceptable actions is war, [CT_NAME]. We will no longer tolerate your unwelcome influence and dangerous decisions! ([OUR_NAME] declares war!)
